channel.title: Trimming skill

item.title: Trimming skill
item.dc:creator: @kiev kiev
item.description:
@kiev wrote:

as some of you may no there is a trimming skill on some servers.
i tried adding stuff to it but get 100 errors here is what i add:

[code]////////dragon
public void dcb()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 120)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false) && (playerHasItemAmount(3141, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You DON’T HAVE the NEEDED SUPPLIES”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(3141, 1) == true)
{

addSkillXP((20000*playerLevel[24]), 24);
deleteItem(3141, getItemSlot(3141), 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
sendMessage(“You Trim Your Chain Body for A Dharoks Body”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 120)
{
sendMessage(“You need 120 trimming dude!”);
}
}
}

public void dss()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 100)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false) && (playerHasItemAmount(1187, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You DON’T HAVE the NEEDED SUPPLIES”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1187, 1) == true)
{

addSkillXP((13000*playerLevel[24]), 24);
deleteItem(1187, getItemSlot(1187), 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
sendMessage(“You Trim Your Shield For a Dharoks Axe”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 100)
{
sendMessage(“You need 100 trimming dude!”);
}
}
}

public void dpl()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 115)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false) && (playerHasItemAmount(4087, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You DON’T HAVE the NEEDED SUPPLIES”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4087, 1) == true)
{

addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[24]), 24);
deleteItem(4087, getItemSlot(4087), 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
sendMessage(“You Trim Your Legs for Dharok legs”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 115)
{
sendMessage(“You need 115 trimming dude!”);
}
}
}

public void dps()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 115)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false) && (playerHasItemAmount(4585, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You DON’T HAVE the NEEDED SUPPLIES”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4585, 1) == true)
{

addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[24]), 24);
deleteItem(4585, getItemSlot(4584), 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
sendMessage(“You Trim Your skirt for Dharok legs”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 115)
{
sendMessage(“You need 115 trimming dude!”);
}
}
}

public void dmh()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 105)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false) && (playerHasItemAmount(1149, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You DON’T HAVE the NEEDED SUPPLIES”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1149, 1) == true)
{

addSkillXP((12000*playerLevel[24]), 24);
deleteItem(1149, getItemSlot(1149), 1);
addItem(4716, 1);
sendMessage(“You Trim Your helm For a dharoks helm”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 105)
{
sendMessage(“You need 105 trimming dude!”);
}
}
}
////////endofdragon[/code]
